SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &UC4_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR#) :SET &SPACE_CHECK# = STR_FIND(&UC4_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR#, ' ') :IF &SPACE_CHECK# > 0 : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = '"&UC4_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR#\bin\jboss-cli.bat" --connect' :ELSE : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = '&UC4_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR#\bin\jboss-cli.bat --connect' :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOST# NE "" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = "&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --controller=&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOST#" : IF &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PORT# NE "" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = "&UC4_JBOSS_CLI#:&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PORT#" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_USERNAME# NE "" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = "&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --user=&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_USERNAME#" : IF &UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PASSWORD# <> "" OR "--10" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PASSWORD#" ! $TMP_PWD=$env:UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD ! Decrypt passphrase : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# = "&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --password=$UC4_DECRYPTED_JB_PWD" : ENDIF :ENDIF
